verses.verse: Run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3045>now<s%>, and know, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>places<s%> <S%H4672>there<s%>, if you can find a <S%H376>man<s%>, if there <S%H3426>be<s%> any that <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, that <S%H1245>seeks<s%> the <S%H530>truth<s%>; and I will pardon <S%H5545>it<s%>.
And though they <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>; surely they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, are not your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon the <S%H530>truth<s%>? you have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> <S%H2342>them<s%>, but they have not grieved; you have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H3985>them<s%>, but they have refused to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%>: they have made their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> than a <S%H5553>rock<s%>; they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>.

Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely these are <S%H1800>poor<s%>; they are <S%H2973>foolish<s%>: for they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, nor the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>.

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the great <S%H1419>men<s%>, and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H3045>them<s%>; for they have known the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>: but these have <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds<s%>.

Therefore a <S%H738>lion<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H2061>them<s%>, and a wolf of the <S%H6160>evenings<s%> shall <S%H7703>plunder<s%> <S%H5246>them<s%>, a leopard shall <S%H8245>watch<s%> over their <S%H5892>cities<s%>: every one that goes <S%H3318>out<s%> there <S%H2007>shall<s%> be torn in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>: because their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many<s%>, and their <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%>.

<S%H335>How<s%> shall I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> you for <S%H2063>this<s%>? your <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7650>me<s%>, and sworn by them that are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: when I had fed them to the <S%H7650>full<s%>, they then committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and assembled themselves by <S%H1413>troops<s%> in the <S%H2181>harlots<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>.
They were as <S%H2109>fed<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> in the <S%H7904>morning<s%>: every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6670>neighed<s%> after his <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>.
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for these <S%H5002>things<s%>? says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a nation as <S%H1471>this<s%>?

Go you <S%H5927>up<s%> upon her <S%H8284>walls<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%>; but <S%H6213>make<s%> not a full <S%H3617>end<s%>: take <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>battlements<s%>; for they are not the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s.

For the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have dealt <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

They have <S%H3584>denied<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not <S%H7451>he<s%>; neither shall evil <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H7200>us<s%>; neither shall we see <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H7458>famine<s%>:
And the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall become <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and the <S%H1696>word<s%> is not in <S%H6213>them<s%>: thus shall it be done unto them.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Because you <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, <S%H5414>behold<s%>, I will make my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, and this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and it shall devour <S%H398>them<s%>.

<S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring a <S%H1471>nation<s%> upon you from <S%H4801>far<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: it is a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, it is a <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H8085>not<s%>, neither understand what they <S%H1696>say<s%>.
Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is as a <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>tomb<s%>, they are all mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and your <S%H3899>bread<s%>, which your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> should <S%H398>eat<s%>: they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%>: they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> your <S%H1612>vines<s%> and your fig <S%H8384>trees<s%>: they shall <S%H7567>impoverish<s%> your <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, where <S%H2007>you<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%>, with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
Nevertheless in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full end with <S%H3617>you<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H559>pass<s%>, when you shall say, <S%H8478>Why<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> do all these things unto <S%H559>us<s%>? then shall you answer <S%H5800>them<s%>, Just as you have forsaken <S%H5647>me<s%>, and served <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>, so shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a land that is not <S%H776>yours<s%>.
<S%H5046>Declare<s%> this in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H8085>publish<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> now <S%H5530>this<s%>, O foolish <S%H5971>people<s%>, and without <S%H3820>understanding<s%>; which have <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H241>not<s%>; which have ears, and hear <S%H8085>not<s%>:

<S%H3372>Fear<s%> you not <S%H5002>me<s%>? says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: will you not <S%H2342>tremble<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence<s%>, which have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> for the <S%H1366>bound<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>decree<s%>, that it cannot <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H1530>it<s%>: and though the waves there <S%H1607>toss<s%> <S%H3201>themselves<s%>, yet can they not prevail; though they <S%H1993>roar<s%>, yet can they not pass over <S%H5674>it<s%>?
But this <S%H5971>people<s%> has a <S%H5637>revolting<s%> and a <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; they have <S%H5493>revolted<s%> and are <S%H3212>gone<s%>.

Neither <S%H559>say<s%> they in their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Let us now <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, both the <S%H3138>former<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter<s%>, in his <S%H6256>season<s%>: he <S%H8104>reserves<s%> unto us the <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.
Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have turned <S%H5186>away<s%> these <S%H2403>things<s%>, and your sins have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> good things from <S%H2896>you<s%>.

For among my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7789>men<s%>: they lay wait, as he that <S%H7918>sets<s%> <S%H3353>snares<s%>; they <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap<s%>, they <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.

As a <S%H3619>cage<s%> is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds<s%>, so are their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%>: therefore they are become <S%H1431>great<s%>, and grown <S%H6238>rich<s%>.

They are grown <S%H8080>fat<s%>, they <S%H6245>shine<s%>: <S%H5674>Yes<s%>, they overpass the <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>: they <S%H1777>judge<s%> not the <S%H1779>cause<s%>, the cause of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, yet they <S%H6743>prosper<s%>; and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> do they not <S%H8199>judge<s%>.
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for these <S%H5002>things<s%>? says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a nation as <S%H1471>this<s%>?
A <S%H8047>wonderful<s%> and horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>;

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> carry <S%H7287>rule<s%> by their <S%H3027>means<s%>; and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> to have it <S%H6213>so<s%>: and what will you do in the end <S%H319>there<s%>?
